name: Zampi Bomber
description:
Controls:

PC:

Use left and right keys to turn.

Use space to shoot

Use Enter to return when text stops (do not interrupt text, as this can mess with javascript)

Mobile:

Press on the left and right edges of the display view to turn.

Press on the center of the screen to shoot.

Press on the center of the screen to return when text stops (do not interrupt text, as this can mess with javascript)

https://github.com/champfish/ZanpiBomber

Made at GameJab at University of Texas at Dallas.
